cynic.name: CYNIC Brain
instructions: Use brain_* tools for CYNIC-specific operations
Always respect φ⁻¹ (61.8%) max confidence
brain_cynic_judge evaluates items using 25 dimensions
brain_memory_* tools access collective memory
brain_patterns shows detected patterns from observations

toolHints.brain_cynic_judge: Use for evaluating code, tokens, or decisions. Returns Q-Score (0-100) and verdict.
toolHints.brain_memory_search: Search past decisions, patterns, and knowledge. Use for context recall.
toolHints.brain_patterns: View detected patterns. Use action='list' for overview.
toolHints.brain_health: Check CYNIC system health. Quick diagnostic.

render.name: Render.com
instructions: Use list_services to see all deployments
Use get_service with service ID for details
Use list_logs for debugging deployment issues
Always select_workspace first if multiple workspaces

toolHints.list_services: List all Render services in current workspace
toolHints.get_service: Get detailed info about a specific service
toolHints.list_logs: View logs for debugging. Use label_values for filtering.
toolHints.create_web_service: Create new web service from GitHub repo

github.name: GitHub
github.description: GitHub MCP server for repo operations
instructions: Prefer gh CLI for simple operations (faster)
Use MCP tools for complex queries or bulk operations
search_code is powerful for finding patterns across repos

toolHints.search_code: Search code across all repos. Powerful for pattern finding.
toolHints.get_file_contents: Get file content from a repo. Use for reading remote files.
toolHints.create_pull_request: Create PR. Prefer gh CLI for simpler workflow.

solana-dev.name: Solana Dev
instructions: Use devnet for testing, mainnet-beta for production
getAccountInfo returns base64-encoded data
getTransaction needs signature hash, not tx ID
Always verify account ownership before operations

toolHints.getAccountInfo: Get account data. Returns owner, lamports, data (base64).
toolHints.getBalance: Get SOL balance in lamports. Divide by 1e9 for SOL.
toolHints.getTransaction: Get transaction details by signature hash.

playwright.name: Playwright
instructions: Use browser_navigate to open URLs first
Use browser_snapshot for accessibility tree (better than screenshot)
browser_click accepts CSS selectors or text content
Always browser_close when done to free resources

toolHints.browser_navigate: Open URL in browser. Waits for page load.
toolHints.browser_snapshot: Get accessibility tree. Better than screenshot for understanding page.
toolHints.browser_click: Click element by selector or text. Use 'ref' from snapshot.
toolHints.browser_fill_form: Fill form fields. Pass object with field:value pairs.

context7.name: Context7
instructions: Use resolve-library-id first to get library ID
Then query-docs with the resolved ID for documentation
Good for getting up-to-date library usage examples

toolHints.query-docs: Get documentation. Use topic parameter to focus on specific area.
